FTP Server Service

NOTICE:

The namespace prefix http://cisco.com/jnap/ has been deprecated but is still supported. All JNAP clients should switch to the new namespace prefix http://linksys.com/jnap/.

Change History

Revision Date Notes
2.0.0 2019-07-17 Added FTPServer2 service to indicate the following actions now require authentication:
  • GetFTPFolders
  • GetFTPServerSettings

Services

FTPServer

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/FTPServer
This service provides access to a device's FTP folders.

Service Actions

  • CreateFTPFolder
  • DeleteFTPFolder
  • EditFTPFolder
  • GetFTPFolders
  • GetFTPServerSettings
  • SetFTPServerSettings

FTPServer2

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/FTPServer2
This service provides access to a device's FTP folders.

Service Actions

  • CreateFTPFolder
  • DeleteFTPFolder
  • EditFTPFolder
  • GetFTPFolders
  • GetFTPServerSettings
  • SetFTPServerSettings

Actions

CreateFTPFolder

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/CreateFTPFolder
This action creates a new FTP folder on the device.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
name string no The name of the FTP folder. This value must be unique. This value must be between 1 and 22 characters long and may only contain characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9, dash (-), and space ( ).
partitionName string no The name of the partition on which the FTP folder resides.
path string no The path to the directory that corresponds to the FTP folder. Relative paths are interpreted as relative to the root directory of the partition.
isReadOnly bool no Whether the FTP folder is read-only.
groupsWithPermission string[] no The list of groups that have permission to access the FTP folder. This list must always include the value "admin".

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/CreateFTPFolderResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorAdminGroupMustHavePermission The specified list of groups with permission does not contain "admin".
ErrorFolderExists An FTP folder with the specified name already exists.
ErrorInvalidName The specified name is invalid.
ErrorPathDoesNotExist The specified path does not exist.
ErrorTooManyFolders The FTP folder cannot be created because the maximum number of FTP folders has already been reached.
ErrorUnknownGroup One of the specified groups with permission does not exist.
ErrorUnknownPartition The specified partition does not correspond to any mounted partition.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/CreateFTPFolder"

{
  "name": "my stuff",
  "partitionName": "/dev/sdb1",
  "path": "/",
  "isReadOnly": false,
  "groupsWithPermission": [
    "example string"
  ]
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

DeleteFTPFolder

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/DeleteFTPFolder
This action deletes an FTP folder on the device.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
name string no The name of the FTP folder.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/DeleteFTPFolderResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorUnknownFolder The specified FTP folder does not exist.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/DeleteFTPFolder"

{
  "name": "my stuff"
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

EditFTPFolder

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/EditFTPFolder
This action edits information about an FTP folder on the device.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
name string no The name of the FTP folder.
partitionName string no The name of the partition on which the FTP folder resides.
path string no The path to the directory that corresponds to the FTP folder. Relative paths are interpreted as relative to the root directory of the partition.
isReadOnly bool no Whether the FTP folder is read-only.
groupsWithPermission string[] no The list of groups that have permission to access the FTP folder. This list must always include the value "admin".

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/EditFTPFolderResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorAdminGroupMustHavePermission The specified list of groups with permission does not contain "admin".
ErrorPathDoesNotExist The specified path does not exist.
ErrorUnknownFolder The specified FTP folder does not exist.
ErrorUnknownGroup One of the specified groups with permission does not exist.
ErrorUnknownPartition The specified partition does not correspond to any mounted partition.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/EditFTPFolder"

{
  "name": "my stuff",
  "partitionName": "/dev/sdb1",
  "path": "/",
  "isReadOnly": false,
  "groupsWithPermission": [
    "example string"
  ]
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

GetFTPFolders

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetFTPFolders
This action gets a list of the device's FTP folders. Folder names returned by this method are not guaranteed to be unique. This is to allow for detection of share name collisions due to external forces, such as a user inserting two USB drives configured with colliding share names.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
ftpFolders SharedFolder[] no The list of FTP folders.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetFTPFoldersResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetFTPFolders"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "ftpFolders": [
      {
        "name": "My Music",
        "partitionName": "/dev/sdb1",
        "path": "/",
        "pathExists": true,
        "isReadOnly": false,
        "groupsWithPermission": [
          "example string"
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}

GetFTPServerSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetFTPServerSettings
This service provides access to a device's FTP folders. This action gets the device's FTP server settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
serverName string no The server name.
isEnabled bool no Whether the server is currently enabled.
isAnonymousReadAccessEnabled bool no Whether anonymous FTP read access is currently enabled.
port int no The port that the FTP server is currently exposed on.
encoding string no The encoding used by the server.
supportedEncodings string[] no The list of encodings supported by the server.
maxFTPFolders int yes A platform-specific limit on the number of FTP folders. If this value is not present, there is no limit to the number of FTP folders.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetFTPServerSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetFTPServerSettings"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "serverName": "ftpserver",
    "isEnabled": true,
    "isAnonymousReadAccessEnabled": true,
    "port": 21,
    "encoding": "Unicode (UTF-8)",
    "supportedEncodings": [
      "example string"
    ],
    "maxFTPFolders": 123
  }
}

SetFTPServerSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/SetFTPServerSettings
This action sets the device's FTP server settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
serverName string no The server name. The server name must be between 1 and 15 characters long and can only contain characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9, dash (-), and space ( ).
isEnabled bool no Whether the server should be enabled.
isAnonymousReadAccessEnabled bool no Whether anonymous FTP read access should be enabled.
port int no The port that the FTP server should be exposed on. This value must be between 0 and 65535.
encoding string no The encoding used by the server.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/SetFTPServerSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorInvalidPort The specified port was not between 0 and 65535.
ErrorInvalidServerName The specified server name name is not valid.
ErrorUnsupportedEncoding The specified encoding is not supported by the server.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/SetFTPServerSettings"

{
  "serverName": "ftpserver",
  "isEnabled": true,
  "isAnonymousReadAccessEnabled": true,
  "port": 21,
  "encoding": "Unicode (UTF-8)"
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

Structures

SharedFolder

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/SharedFolder
Information about and current settings of a shared folder.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
name string no The name of the shared folder.
partitionName string no The name of the partition on which the shared folder resides.
path string no The path to the directory that corresponds to the shared folder. Relative paths are interpreted as relative to the root directory of the partition.
pathExists bool no Whether the path exists on the partition.
isReadOnly bool no Whether the shared folder is read-only.
groupsWithPermission string[] no The list of groups that have permission to access the shared folder.
